title: food waste
body:
...

So I was in the restaurant finishing my meal and packing up the left overs

and behind my seat were two of these girls, that only finish 1/2, 2/5, and 1/5 of the plates, and they just paid the bill and left while not bothering wanting to pack up their left overs in a pick up box. While those left overs could had been used to feed over 10 starving people.

Im surprised that these type of people still exists, like u serious? not only you are wasting money but wasting food??  Man those two must have never felt what its like to starve like the other million people out there. all the starving children and poor people. While I knew what its like while I tried it out myself and experience how food felt scarce and valuable. Do they even know how hard it is to earn money or how other immigrants and people had worked?

I seriously wonder how they are raised and what kind of parents they have...
